useCase.name: User searches for content using speech input
useCase.description: As a user, I want to search for content by speaking into the device.

preconditions.precondition: User device has speech input functionality enabled.

successEndConditions.condition: Content matching the search query is displayed to the user.

useCase.trigger: User speaks into the device to start the search process.

mainSequence.step: User speaks into the device to search for content.
The UI interface captures the audio input.
The Speech Recognition Module processes and converts speech to text.
The Speech Recognition Module sends the converted text to the Content Query Processor.
Content Query Processor queries the Content Database for matching content items.
Content Query Processor displays the search results to the user.
The UI interface shows the search results to the user.
